amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part B of House Report 117-109 to allow United States researchers to study and examine the potential impacts of several schedule I drugs, such as MDMA, psilocybin, and or ibogaine, that have been shown to be effective in treating critical diseases.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to allow United States researchers to study and examine the potential impacts of several schedule I drugs, such as MDMA, psilocybin, and or ibogaine, that have been shown to be effective in treating critical diseases.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A007) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 140 - 285 (Roll no. 230).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A007) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Ocasio-Cortez.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A007) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 140 - 285 (Roll no. 230).

Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A007) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 140 - 285 (Roll no. 230).
